directions: In a saucepan, combine the apples, sugar, cinnamon and water. Stir to dissolve sugar, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until apples are soft and syrup has thickened. Serve over pancakes or ice cream.
ingredients: 2 tart apples - peeled, cored, and sliced
title: Cinnamon Apple Syrup
